translation.en: Look, I know you love Christmas, but there's no need to shag the tree.
translation.ko: 아무리 크리스마스가 좋아도 트리랑 떡칠 건 없잖아

translation.en: I thought we were gonna decorate the tree together with the children.
I don't want their toilet roll decorations.
[woman] For once, I just want this family to have a perfect Christmas.
translation.ko: 한 번이라도 크리스마스를 완벽하게 보내고 싶어

translation.en: [Peter] Do you know what would be perfect, darling?
You, me, the kids, piña coladas.
translation.ko: 당신과 나, 우리 애들 피냐 콜라다

translation.en: Don't be a fool, Peter. We can't take Mummy to the Bahamas.
And what would I do about my sisters?
We'll leave the key under the mat. They'll be fine.
translation.ko: 열쇠 두고 가면 되지 8월부터 음식도 준비해 놨고

translation.en: I have to collect the wreath, pick up the kids.
Get a new loo brush. Mum's had irritable bowel.
translation.ko: 엄마가 과민대장증후군이라 변기 솔도 사야 해

translation.en: And I need to get the presents to the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.ko: 빵집은 5시에 문 닫고 나이팅게일 로지에 선물!

translation.en: -Upstairs in the bedroom. -Which one, dear? We have many.
translation.ko: - 위층 침실에 - 어떤 침실? 여러 개잖아

translation.en: Caroline, darling, which bag is it?
[Caroline] Family on the left. Nightingale on the right.
translation.ko: 가족 건 왼쪽 나이팅게일 건 오른쪽

translation.en: Darling, my right or bed right?

translation.ko: - 즐거운 연휴 보내요! - 감사해요, 메리 크리스마스!

translation.en: [Caroline] I'm sorry. I'm here. I'm sorry I'm late.
Come on then, kids. So, how was the party?
Eliza's getting a bra for Christmas.
And how about you? Did you manage to get any chocolate in your mouth?
translation.ko: 넌 초콜릿을 먹진 않고 입술에만 묻혔니?

translation.en: I don't want to play Mary. It's too much pressure.
translation.ko: 마리아 역할 싫어요 부담이 너무 커요

translation.en: But it's the lead. You're not a supporting actress.
translation.ko: 그래도 조연 말고 주연이잖아 아니면 양이나 할래?

translation.en: -What do you want to be? A sheep? -I have to sing.
translation.ko: 그래도 조연 말고 주연이잖아 아니면 양이나 할래? 노래해야 한다고요

translation.en: Well, well, well. If it isn't the Virgin Mary.
translation.ko: 이게 누구신가? 우리 동정 마리아가 오셨네

translation.en: Caroline Christmas-Hope, a lady like you is never late.
translation.ko: 캐럴라인 크리스마스호프 너 같은 여인은 안 늦지

translation.en: She arrives precisely when she means to.
translation.ko: 등장해야 할 때 딱 등장할 뿐

translation.en: Charmer. Where would you like the presents?
Edna, dear. You're wearing odd shoes.
She's got another pair just like it.
[chuckles] Are you looking forward to the nativity play?
I played the Virgin Mary at the National Theatre.
translation.ko: 난 국립극장에서 동정 마리아 역할을 했어

translation.en: My God, the people I slept with to get the part!
translation.ko: 그 역할 따내려고 몇 놈하고 같이 잤는지, 원

translation.en: [Caroline] There we go. Oh, hang on.
Okay, got everything? Bags? Good. Great. In we go. There we go.
translation.ko: 다 챙겼니? 가방도? 좋아 이제 들어가자

translation.en: To the right. To the right. This way.
I thought we could finish this together.
Why don't we just stick this on top of the tree?
-You know, that's a pretty good idea. -Yeah.
-It is, isn't it? It's a good idea. -Yeah.
Do you remember last time? We put it all over the place.
-Do you remember that? -I can make the best mince pies.
You're not going to fight with Auntie Joanna, are you?
Hello, Mummy. Everything's going really well.
translation.ko: 안녕, 엄마 준비는 척척 잘돼 가요

translation.en: This is going to be the best Christmas ever.
-It doesn't have to be perfect, darling. -[Caroline] Yes, it does.
I've had 27 years of therapy trying to recalibrate Christmas,
ever since our shithead of a father abandoned us on Christmas Day.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠라는 인간이 크리스마스에 우릴 버렸잖아요

translation.en: Don't say it doesn't have to be perfect, 'cause it bloody well has to be.
translation.ko: 그러니 그런 말씀 마세요 무조건 완벽해야 하니까

translation.en: So why don't you tell Hamish to put his foot down? You're already late.
translation.ko: 해미시한테 좀 밟으라고 하세요 이미 늦었잖아요
사소한 문제가 있다 해미시가 아니라 필릭스야

translation.en: Hamish is now Felix. She traded in her trader for a new one.
translation.ko: 사소한 문제가 있다 해미시가 아니라 필릭스야 조아나가 증권맨을 딴 남자랑 트레이드했단다

translation.en: Excellent! Anything else I should know about?
[woman] Caroline Christmas-Hope, you need to calm down.
The most important day of the year.
We don't want to stay in the Brontë room this year.
It's too cramped, and we need a really comfortable bed.
translation.ko: 침대가 너무 좁은데 우린 편한 침대여야 하거든

translation.en: -Sciatica, darling. I'm not 83. -We'll take the Queen room.
translation.ko: 좌골 신경통이야 내가 노인으로 보여? 퀸룸으로 해줘

translation.en: But Mummy has the Queen room.
Her knees are bad, and she actually likes
translation.ko: 엄마는 무릎도 안 좋고 그 끔찍한 조무래기 손주들을 좋아하시잖아

translation.en: I'm allergic to them. So we've agreed to do a swap.
translation.ko: 난 걔들은 질색이라 방 바꿔주신다고 했어

translation.en: She's got her chaste little knickers in a twist again, Mummy.
Joanna Christmas, be nice. We'll be with you in about an hour.
translation.ko: 조아나 크리스마스, 그럼 못써 1시간 정도 걸릴 거다

translation.en: Never know how you're gonna turn up. I was hoping for a Red Arrow this year.
translation.ko: 하여간 등장이 요란해 올해는 항공 쇼라도 하며 등장하나 했더니

translation.en: Come and see our Christmas tree. We made all the decorations ourselves.
translation.ko: 크리스마스트리 보러 가요 우리가 직접 꾸몄어요

translation.en: Good Lord, darling. Look at that. It's a Rolls-Royce.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 저 차 좀 봐 롤스로이스야

translation.en: Merry Christmas. Hey, this place is absolutely idyllic.
translation.ko: 메리 크리스마스예요 이야, 여긴 정말 전원의 풍류가 넘치네요

translation.en: Yes. Hamish, lovely to meet you at last. Heard a lot about you.
translation.ko: 그렇죠 해미시, 드디어 만났네요 말씀 많이 들었어요

translation.en: For once in your life, you're ahead of the curve.
Well, probably for the best. Heard Hamish was a total tosser.
-Must have cost a packet. -Well, not really.
when one of my feudal ancestors picked it up a few centuries ago.
translation.ko: 영주였던 우리 조상님이 10파운드 정도 주고 몇백 년 전에 건진 거라

translation.en: -Really? -So no need to be impressed. Nothing to do with me.
translation.ko: 대단할 것도 없어요 내가 안 샀으니까

translation.en: -Let me show you around. Come on. -Oh, yes. [laughs]
Caroline! Caroline, darling. I… I… I think I'm stuck.
No, I… I am actually stuck.
Happy Christmas, darling. Can you press that?
Or is it Doctor of Music Paulina?
Not yet. I've gotta finish my thesis.
Right, come along. Let's get you inside so you can complete your oeuvre.
translation.ko: 따라와, 어서 들어가서 처제의 전작을 완성해야지

translation.en: The theme was supposed to be "The 12 Days of Christmas."
[Joanna] But you went with the theme of sewage instead.
We decorated the Christmas tree with Daddy.
I think it's wonderful. Come and give your grandma a kiss.
translation.ko: 정말 멋지다, 어서 와서 할머니한테 뽀뽀해 줘야지

translation.en: Don't call me Auntie! You know I hate that!
translation.ko: 이모라고 하지 마 그렇게 부르는 거 싫다니까

translation.en: Touch it again, and I'll kill you! This bag is worth more than your kidneys.
translation.ko: 또 손대면 죽는다 네 콩팥 값보다 비싼 거야

translation.en: Do you wanna look in my bag?
How on earth did you afford a trip across America?
translation.ko: 네가 무슨 돈으로 미국 일주를 하고 와?

translation.en: Felix, are you at the beginning or the end
translation.ko: 필릭스, 우리 언니랑 3개월 연애 기간 중

translation.en: of a three-month relationship with my sister?
We've been together for ten weeks.
What a bevy of beauties, eh?
I can remember when you lot used to fight like Spitfires and Messerschmitts.
translation.ko: 영국과 독일 전투기들처럼 싸우던 게 엊그제 같은데

translation.en: peacefully working together in a loving sisterhood.
translation.ko: 평화롭게 둘러앉아 정겨운 자매애를 다지고 있군

translation.en: a tribute to that bewitching mother of yours.
translation.ko: 네 자매의 매혹적인 어머니에게 찬사를 보내오

translation.en: -Merry, merry Christmas to all of us! -Merry Christmas!
[boy] Where did you get all this?
I went into Auntie Joanna's bags.
She said she'd kill you. Now, sit still.
translation.ko: 널 죽인다고 했지 자, 가만히 있어

translation.en: I need to do your blush.
In the library working on her thesis.
[sighs] She's been working on her thesis for ten years.
It's about the Fab Four. Why they split.
translation.ko: 팹 포에 관한 논문이야 왜 해체했는지

translation.en: We all know why. It's 'cause Robbie wanted a solo career.
translation.ko: 그건 다 알잖아 로비가 솔로로 활동하고 싶어서

translation.en: No. Not Take That. The Beatles.
Sex and drugs and rock 'n' roll.
Well, if Paulina won't come to us, maybe we should go to her.
translation.ko: 폴리나가 안 오면 우리가 찾아가면 되지

translation.en: Oh! And I have something to show you all in the library. Very exciting. Come on!
translation.ko: 서재에 보여줄 것도 있어 꽤 볼만해, 어서 와

translation.en: Paulina, are you really going to spend the next three days in a darkened room?
translation.ko: 폴리나, 정말 사흘 동안 이 어두운 방에만 있을 거야?

translation.en: I want to be left alone and write the ultimate dissertation
translation.ko: 난 고독을 즐기며 사상 가장 위대한 록밴드에 관한 궁극의 논문을 쓸 거야

translation.en: about the greatest rock band in the history of the world.
translation.ko: 사상 가장 위대한 록밴드에 관한 궁극의 논문을 쓸 거야

translation.en: Oh, so you're writing about U2 now as well?
Felix, would you like to see some family photos?
Of when I was growing up, and Joanna was at university.
translation.ko: 저 어릴 때랑 조아나가 대학생 때예요

translation.en: I was ahead of my time. We're practically twins.
[chuckles] Sorry. I'd just like to go over the itinerary for the next few days.
translation.ko: 미안한데 내가 짠 일정을 같이 봐줬으면 해

translation.en: Christmas Eve is the grand buffet.
If you're all still hungry, go to the Plough Inn.
Oh, Vicky, you like a good plowing.
translation.ko: 비키, 넌 꼭 가서 허기를 달래야겠다

translation.en: That's 'cause I'm still young enough to sow my oats.
[Caroline] Yes, and tomorrow we have the Howden Christmas Fair,
translation.ko: 그리고 내일은 하우던 크리스마스 축제가 있어

translation.en: which, as always, will be oodles of fun.
But I've just got to Yoko.
The fair is a Christmas tradition.
Christmas Day, we've got a nativity play at the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 당일에는 나이팅게일 로지에서 성탄극을 해

translation.en: Ooh, love a whiff of urine and old fart on Christmas Day.
Joanna, maybe we can get you a room.
translation.ko: 조아나, 거기에 언니 방 하나 잡아야겠다

translation.en: Please, could we just be a family and have a lovely Christmas?
translation.ko: 제발 좀 가족답게 지내면서 즐거운 성탄절 보내면 안 될까?

translation.en: Which happens to be a very special day because--
-Yes, Peter, please. -I married the love of my life.
translation.ko: - 피터, 조용 - 내 운명과 결혼한 날이야

translation.en: You know what? We're gonna go stay at the Plough Inn.
-We are? -But why? Your room's all ready.
-I just carried everything upstairs. -And you can bring them down again.
translation.ko: - 짐 다 위층으로 옮겼어 - 그럼 도로 갖고 내려와

translation.en: I refuse to spend another night under the same roof as you.
translation.ko: 너랑 한 지붕 아래서 하룻밤도 같이 못 있겠다

translation.en: [Peter] You sure you can't convince her to stay?
The Plough Inn is no Savoy.
[chuckles] Joanna is very strong-willed. Probably not worth the fight.
translation.ko: 조아나가 황소고집이라 괜히 입만 아플 거예요

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind, you can always come back here.
Are you not sleeping in the same room as your wife?
Uh, apparently, I snore, spin, steal the bedsheets… Generally annoying.
translation.ko: 코를 심하게 고나 봐요 뒹굴기에 이불 뺏기까지 대체로 잠버릇이 고약하죠

translation.en: It'll be 18 years on Boxing Day.
And how long you been sleeping by yourself?
[inhales deeply] Not for a while, no.
Can I ask you a question?
No one in this family respects what I'm doing.
translation.ko: 우리 가족은 아무도 내 일을 존중해 주지 않아

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to John, Paul, George, and Ringo.
translation.ko: 난 존과 폴, 조지, 링고에게 내 인생을 바쳤어

translation.en: Paulina, even the Beatles didn't dedicate their lives to the Beatles.
translation.ko: 폴리나, 비틀스 멤버조차 비틀스에 인생을 바치진 않았어

translation.en: God, I loathe our little sister.
Um, would you like a plate?
You take one more step towards me,
I swear to God, I will rip out your larynx and wrap it round your tits.
translation.ko: 네 기다란 목을 뽑아내 네 가슴에 싸맬 줄 알아

translation.en: You'd think you'd be able to at your age.
-For a week. Maybe two. -[inaudible] Oh my God.
What are you girls talking about?
Mum, your buttons are all done wrong on your blouse.
translation.ko: 엄마 블라우스 단추가 다 잘못 끼워졌어요

translation.en: Silly me. I'm losing the plot.
You'll have to get a room for me at Nightingale Lodge.
-Would you like a plate? -[Elizabeth] Mm. Thank you.
-Did you make this, darling? -Yes, it's for tomorrow.
Silly me, asking about your private life.
Please, do not worry about it.
Oh yes. You'll find out soon enough.
translation.ko: - 그래요? - 네 곧 알게 될 거예요

translation.en: Vicky, when you went to Florida,
did you by any chance invite anyone for Christmas?
Who on earth comes from Florida?
Do you think that was a good idea,
or that maybe you should have asked the host first?
translation.ko: 호스트한테 먼저 물어볼 생각은 안 했어?

translation.en: -Is it who I think it is? -[squeaky] Mm-hmm!
Yeah, well, whoever it is, I'm gonna let them in, darling.
Especially if they have come all the way from Florida. [chuckles]
I know it's been a long time.
Uh, this is my girlfriend, Jackie.
It's so nice to meet you all.
Oh my God! This castle is so adorable.
How could Princess Meghan leave this?
I… I should introduce myself. I'm your son-in-law.
Y'all drink proper tea and everything.
This is the most awesome Christmas.
And I love that you recycle. I saw the tree.
translation.ko: 재활용하는 것도 맘에 들어요 트리 봤어요

translation.en: This is so damn typical of you.
Thinking nothing of taking a big crap over the rest of us,
and expecting someone else, usually me, to clean it up.
-He's got old, hasn't he? -[scoffs] It's been 27 years.
I know. She looks like she's only a couple of years older than me.
translation.ko: 내 말이, 나보다 겨우 한두 살 많아 보여

translation.en: And what is up with his American accent?
He's like the oldest swinger in town.
-Ah. -Twenty-five years now. Best thing I ever did.
translation.ko: 벌써 25년 됐어 내 생애 최고의 선택이었지

translation.en: and I've not had a girlfriend over 40 yet.
translation.ko: 마흔 넘는 여친은 둔 적이 없어

translation.en: That gives me five more years.
And you've lost your English accent.
Some things I can do without.
And have you heard her speak?
It's like she massacres the English language.
She's actually really nice when you get to know her.
Yeah, well, I have no intention of getting to know her.
translation.ko: 그 애를 알고 싶은 마음이 조금도 없는걸

translation.en: I've been planning this Christmas for six months.
Him being here is the worst Christmas since he left.
translation.ko: 아빠가 온 게 아빠 없는 크리스마스보다 최악이야

translation.en: Paulina, what are you doing here? I told you to stay with Mum. Is she okay?
translation.ko: 폴리나, 여길 왜 와? 엄마랑 있으라니까, 엄만 어때?

translation.en: [exhales] I've maintained a strange devotion to my queen and country.
translation.ko: 난 여태 여왕님과 조국에 기이한 충성심을 갖고 있다

translation.en: You cling to her all you like. Be my guest.
translation.ko: 여왕한테 매달리든 말든 형 마음대로 해

translation.en: Know what I hate about being English in America?
translation.ko: 미국에서 영국인이라 싫은 게 뭔지 알아?

translation.en: -I can't believe you invited him, Vicks. -[exhales]
You're so selfish. Can you imagine a world where you have responsibilities?
translation.ko: 이기적이기 짝이 없어 책임감 같은 건 모르니?

translation.en: Like a job or a family or a marriage.
What, like yours? With your husband in the east wing?
You know what? I will leave you to it, Miss Perfect Pants.
"The love you take is equal to the love you make." Paul McCartney.
translation.ko: 폴 매카트니 왈, '사랑은 베푸는 만큼 얻는 것이다'

translation.en: Will you just shut up about my sex life?
What are you all doing in here?
Will you please go out and be with your father?
-Mummy, are you all right? -Yes, I'm fine.
♪ On the first day of Christmas My true love sent to me ♪
translation.ko: 크리스마스 첫째 날 내 사랑이 내게 준 선물

translation.en: ♪ A partridge in a pear tree ♪
♪ On the second day of Christmas My true love sent to me… ♪
translation.ko: 크리스마스 둘째 날 내 사랑이 내게 준 선물

translation.en: Where do you think you're going? We are all in this together.
translation.ko: 어딜 내빼는 거야? 다 같이 이 사태를 해결해야지

translation.en: I spent two weeks in Florida with him. He's all yours.
translation.ko: 플로리다에서 아빠랑 2주를 보냈어 이제 언니들 차례야

translation.en: Just run away and leave us to deal with the big turd there-- Hello, carol singers!
translation.ko: 똥만 싸지르고 내빼면 우리더러 치우란 거야? 성가단 여러분!

translation.en: You know why Christmas is so cruddy around you, Caroline?
translation.ko: 언니가 준비하는 크리스마스가 왜 꽝인지 알아?

translation.en: It's because you put too much pressure on everything to make it…
translation.ko: 모든 걸 완벽하게 하려고 너무 신경을 써서…

translation.en: -Hey, don't you touch the Rolls-Royce. -[carol singers continue]
Go on, then! Off you go!
And don't worry about the nuclear bomb you just detonated.
We'll deal with the fallout. Will you just shut up?
And the bitch has nicked the Roller!
♪ On the third day of Christmas… ♪
Take as many as you like.
♪ And a partridge in a pear tree ♪
Do you know anything by the Beatles?
-Did Vicky just take my Rolls? -Felix, not the moment.
translation.ko: - 내 차 가져간 거야? - 필릭스, 분위기 파악 좀

translation.en: So, I presume you'll be joining us for Christmas.
Well, that was the plan, sweetheart, if that's okay?
Any food preferences I should know about?
Anything is fine. Uh, we don't wanna cause any trouble.
translation.ko: 뭐든 괜찮다 민폐 끼치러 온 거 아니야

translation.en: We are paleo, keto, kosher, vegan, gluten-free, refined sugar-free,
translation.ko: 우린 팔레오 식단을 해요 거기에 키토, 코셔, 비건 글루텐프리, 비정제 설탕을 먹고

translation.en: but with the inciest, winciest bit of caffeine.
How about Caroline cooks you up a nice piece of wood?
I know just how you feel, Paul.
-Well, I like these little characters. -[Jackie chuckles]
I'm your grandpa. And you are Daisey.
And I am delighted to meet you both.
He does look a little dead, doesn't he? [chuckles]
Yes, well, the rumors of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
translation.ko: 그래, 뭐 내가 죽었다는 소문은 크게 부풀려진 거다

translation.en: I'm very much alive and well.
Where's she taken my car? I paid 300,000 for it.
translation.ko: 차 가지고 어디 간 거야? 30만 파운드짜리라고

translation.en: Yeah, there's 200 grand of my clothes in there.
translation.ko: 내 옷 20만 파운드어치가 그 차 안에 있어

translation.en: You're doing awfully well, Joanna. You used to cry over hand-me-downs.
translation.ko: 꽤 잘나가는구나, 조아나 옷 물려 입는다고 징징대더니

translation.en: She's a fashion editor. They're all freebies.
translation.ko: 쟤 패션 에디터예요 옷은 다 협찬이죠

translation.en: You can borrow something from my wardrobe.
Oh, I love your dinky little English accents.
I feel like I've landed in Hogwarts.
Uh, since when did you sprout massive knockers?
That is a very expensive brassiere.
detailed with macramé using the frastaglio technique,
and you have stuffed it with pairs of your cheesy socks.
translation.ko: 그런데 이 저급한 양말들을 이 안에 쑤셔 넣어?

translation.en: Don't worry, darling. Auntie Joanna's not really cross.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 이모 진짜로 화난 거 아니야

translation.en: And you, Liza Minnelli, come here.
translation.ko: 너, 이 라이자 미넬리야 당장 이리 와

translation.en: We don't believe in the use of animals for cosmetics.
No, you just believe in seducing old cosmetic dentists with fat wallets.
translation.ko: 그래서 늙고 지갑 두둑한 미용 치과 의사를 꼬시나?

translation.en: [sobs] I don't want to go to prison.
No, not you. My little bitch of a sister who has stolen my clothes.
translation.ko: 너 말고, 내 옷들 훔쳐 간 그 싸가지 없는 막내!

translation.en: -And my car. -Vicky's family. She'll bring it all back.
translation.ko: - 내 차도! - 비키는 가족이니 돌아올 거야

translation.en: There's no signal. We can't get out of this godforsaken place.
translation.ko: 신호가 안 잡혀 이 망할 곳에서 나가지도 못해

translation.en: You can't call the police at Christmas!
Not one bar in this house.
Well, I think this has been a marvelous catch-up.
translation.ko: 그간 살아온 얘기는 아주 잘 들었다

translation.en: I think we've dealt with all the basics.
translation.ko: 기본적인 얘긴 다 한 거 같아

translation.en: And now I'll leave you with these charming girls,
translation.ko: 이제 난 갈 테니 이 복덩이들과 함께

translation.en: so you can see what you've been missing for the last 27 years.
So, I guess we should find you two a room.
translation.ko: 그럼 두 분 방을 마련해 드려야겠네요

translation.en: Oh, well, we can go to a hotel. Honestly, it's no--
translation.ko: 우린 호텔로 가도 돼 정말 아무 부담…

translation.en: Y'all live like Prince Charles and Queen Camilla.
translation.ko: 어쩜 찰스 왕세자와 커밀라 왕비님처럼 사시네요

translation.en: ♪ In a one-horse open sleigh ♪ ♪ O'er the fields we go ♪
-Oh, so you've read my Tinder profile? -Just the drink, please.
translation.ko: - 내 틴더 프로필 봤군요? - 술이나 주시죠

translation.en: You know, that's not a regular request around here.
translation.ko: 여기선 보통 이런 주문 안 해요

translation.en: Well, I'm an irregular kinda girl.
Hang on. Hang on. It's not done. It's not done.
Come on, Zeus, you troublesome beast.
Whoa! Hey! Careful of my bed.
Hang on. I don't… I don't know your name.
This is a fascinating read, Paulina.
I'll go and get the rest.
First Vicky goes, and now I can't find Mum.
translation.ko: 비키가 가버리더니 이제 엄마도 안 보여

translation.en: What do you mean, darling? Where is she?
I don't know! I've looked everywhere in the house for her.
translation.ko: 몰라, 집 안을 다 돌아다녔는데도 안 계셔

translation.en: Tomorrow will be a good day.
No, it's just the central heating.
[exhales] It's not a rat. It's Ringo.
Well, it's disgusting! Chop its head off!
I almost had a heart attack. Are you sure there's only one?
translation.ko: 심장마비 오는 줄 알았어 더 있는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: I don't wanna sleep here tonight.
Darling, I won't snore or spin or wrap myself up like a cocoon in all the covers.
translation.ko: 나 코 골지도, 구르지도 고치처럼 이불로 싸매지도 않을게

translation.en: I can't believe my father's here.
Well, he has a certain charm.
[sighs] I want to cancel Christmas. Oh, darling.
We're the Christmas-Hopes. It's what we do.
No, it's not, you silly thing.
You'll find a way to make it work. You always do.
translation.ko: 당신은 해결책을 찾을 거야 늘 그러잖아

translation.en: This almond milk is delish. So much better than America.
translation.ko: 이 아몬드밀크 진짜 맛있어요 미국보다 훨씬 낫네요

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. I got a new loo brush.
translation.ko: 걱정 마요, 변기 솔 새것 있어요

translation.en: I love the Beatles, Paulina. This makes me wanna move to Liverpool.
translation.ko: 비틀스에 푹 빠졌어요, 폴리나 리버풀로 이사하고 싶을 정도예요

translation.en: I could get you into 20 Forthlin Road. Paul McCartney's actual house.
translation.ko: 포슬린로드 20번지 구경시켜 줄게요 폴 매카트니가 살았던 집이고

translation.en: -The birthplace of-- -The Beatles and the Scaffold.
Mike McCartney's comedy musical trio. It's all in here.
translation.ko: 여기에 마이크 매카트니의 코미디 뮤지컬 트리오라고 나와요

translation.en: So what do you think? What do you really think?
Oh no. Not two of you.
Today is going to be a good day.
Today is going to be a good day.
Why is C-3PO in my kitchen?
No. Today is going to be a good day.
translation.ko: 몰라, 오늘은 좋은 날이 될 거야

translation.en: [Joanna] Where is Vicky? I want my own clothes back.
translation.ko: 비키는 안 왔어? 내 옷을 입어야겠어

translation.en: Hey. Hey. I've gotta go and clean up in the bar now.
translation.ko: 저기, 나 이제 바에 가서 청소해야 해

translation.en: So, is the, uh, cockerel taking a break from the hens?
translation.ko: 수탉이 암탉들을 피해 잠시 쉬러 나오셨나?

translation.en: Yes, they're no doubt working on their pecking order.
Yeah. Well, I've got a little job for you.
We've gotta get a… get a cow out of a ditch, you know, before the--
translation.ko: 그게 말이야, 소 한 마리가 도랑에 빠져서…

translation.en: [John] I asked her to check out the cottage.
She's got a wonderful eye for interior design. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 자네 장모가 인테리어 보는 눈이 있잖나

translation.en: So she's, uh, gonna try and brighten it up a bit.
You know, boring old bachelor pad.
Anyway, if you could help me with this cow.
It's fallen in a ditch. Silly bitch.
Yes, I'll help you with the cow. Yes.
Just go and buy yourself some fudge or something.
My faith was dwindling. It has now been restored.
translation.ko: 내 믿음이 흔들렸는데 이제 다시 굳건해졌네요

translation.en: Caroline Christmas-Hope, by both name and nature.
translation.ko: 캐럴라인 크리스마스호프 그 이름대로 희망이 넘쳐요

translation.en: We are here to help, Reverend, in the spirit of Christmas.
translation.ko: 크리스마스의 정신을 따라 도우러 왔죠, 신부님

translation.en: I do believe I can see the winning pie.
No, no, no. My entry must remain anonymous.
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 제 파이는 익명으로 참가할 겁니다

translation.en: It looks like we need a chef d'équipe for the Advent Wheel of Fortune.
Someone with real verve and personality.
Uh, we also need someone for Cowpat Bingo.
Would be proud of you on the eve of his birth.
So obviously, I must excuse myself from the pie stand.
translation.ko: 전 파이 가판대에 갈 수 없으니

translation.en: How about I do the jumble for a change?
Oh no, no. We're well-catered for there already.
-What the hell are you doing? -Raising money for the church.
translation.ko: 이게 대체 뭐 하는 짓이야? 교회 기금 모금

translation.en: Have a nice day. Merry Christmas.
Your father is finally here this Christmas.
translation.ko: 너희 아빠가 드디어 올 크리스마스에 여기 왔잖니

translation.en: Let's show him what he's missed.
Joanna! We are so thrilled with your very generous gifts,
translation.ko: 조아나! 이렇게 후한 선물을 내주시니 얼마나 기쁜지 몰라요

translation.en: which I believe were all given to you.
Even I've seen The Devil Wears Prada.
Come on. The Cowpat Bingo won't run itself.
Paulina, put some effort into it.
No wonder no one's spinning it.
Where it ends, no one knows.
It's not a wet weekend in Wigan, darling. It's the Advent Wheel of Fortune!
translation.ko: 어디서 비라도 내리니? '강림절 행운의 바퀴!' 해야지

translation.en: Land on Christmas Day, and you get a knitted toilet-roll cover.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 날인 25에 멈추면 휴지 커버를 드려요

translation.en: Land on it three times, and you get a car.
All right. In we go, Henry.
They sure do Christmas right here.
Mm. What do you think, Henry?
Or… or a nine? A nine.
A nine maybe, or… or a ten.
Sorry we missed breakfast. Jet lag.
translation.ko: 아침 식사 놓쳐서 미안 시차 때문에

translation.en: You've missed more important things over the last 27 years.
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 27년 동안 더 중요한 일도 놓치셨는데

translation.en: I wouldn't concern yourself over a missed breakfast.
translation.ko: 아침 식사 한 번 놓친 게 대수겠어요

translation.en: It's just the way I dress, but thank you.
Well, we're here now to help out in any way we can.
Oh, I don't think there's anything that needs doing.
translation.ko: 더 할 일은 없는 거 같네요

translation.en: Actually, there… there is something you could help with.
translation.ko: 아니, 두 사람이 도와줄 만한 일이 있어

translation.en: This is the one. We've got this. We've got this. Come on!
We got this. We got this. We got this.
Apparently, he's been on the mulled wine since nine o'clock this morning.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 9시부터 멀드 와인을 달린 모양이야

translation.en: What do you propose we do about it?
[James] Well, I wouldn't say no to a glass of warm milk and a small, small plate of cookies.
translation.ko: 나라면 따뜻한 우유 한 잔에 쿠키를 거절하진 않겠다

translation.en: Mrs. Claus has me on a diet.
I think he's rather good at it. Yeah. If only they knew.
Just because he didn't stay in touch doesn't mean he didn't want to.
translation.ko: 연락을 안 했다고 해서 하고 싶지 않았단 건 아니야

translation.en: Santa, this is Isabella. She's been a very good girl.
translation.ko: 산타, 얘는 이자벨라예요 착한 일 많이 했대요

translation.en: [clears throat] That's my favorite elf, Jackie.
What can I do for you, young lady, hm?
Especially at this time of year.
I don't know how you can stand the sight of him.
Um, I think you are actually an angel.
You can't control people or the things they do.
translation.ko: 우린 타인이 뭘 하든 통제할 수 없지만

translation.en: All you can control is how you respond.
Just one more, please. One more.
No, no, Felix. Don't you think someone else should have a go?
translation.ko: 아뇨, 다른 사람도 해봐야 하지 않을까요?

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no.
Yeah! How about I do every spin on the wheel?
translation.ko: 이 놀이는 내가 다 하면 어때요?

translation.en: All right. All right, children. Just a moment.
I will get to each and every one of you,
but for right now, follow my favorite elf to Santa's workshop.
translation.ko: 우선 내 최고의 엘프를 따라 산타의 작업실로 가거라

translation.en: Don't tell Mrs. Claus I said that.
translation.ko: 산타 할머니한테는 이 말 한 거 비밀이다

translation.en: So, what sort of a Father Christmas are you? An absent one?
translation.ko: 어떤 산타 할아버지세요? 가족과 소원해진 산타?

translation.en: Someday we'll have a serious conversation.
translation.ko: 언젠가 형과 깊이 대화할 날이 올 테지

translation.en: How could it be anything else, Santa?
Not just now. There's someone more important I need to speak to.
translation.ko: 지금은 말고, 얘기해야 할 더 중요한 사람이 있어

translation.en: I know you're not real. I'm 12 and three-quarters.
Of course I'm not the real Santa Claus. I'm standing in for him. Everybody knows that.
translation.ko: 당연히 난 진짜가 아니라 대타야 모르는 사람이 없지

translation.en: You didn't even know I existed.
And I'm looking forward to your solo tomorrow.
They wouldn't let you up there if that were true.
and she gave a big donation to the Nightingale Lodge
They wouldn't have cast you if you weren't the best.
Look, if you have enough courage to get up on that stage and sing,
translation.ko: 네가 용기를 내서 무대에 올라가 노래한다면

translation.en: even if you're flat as a cowpat, no one's going to notice.
translation.ko: 아무리 말아먹는다 해도 아무도 모를 거야

translation.en: Look, I'm dressed as Santa Claus, and nobody seems to care.
translation.ko: 산타 복장 하고 있는 나도 아무도 신경 안 쓰잖니

translation.en: You know, people are gonna say and do a lot of things in your life.
translation.ko: 살다 보면 다른 사람이 이래라저래라 말들 하겠지만

translation.en: -Can I ask you a question? -Of course.
Why did you leave Grandma and Mum and her sisters?
Did you ever have something so beautiful, something you loved so much,
translation.ko: 너무 아름답고 진심으로 사랑한 걸 가졌다가

translation.en: So that to… see it or even just think of it
translation.ko: 그래서 그걸 보기만 해도 머릿속에 떠올리기만 해도

translation.en: You have to hide it away.
So that you don't feel sad anymore.
Can you believe I've had to win all these just to get my Rolls back?
translation.ko: 믿어져요? 내 차 돌려받으려고 이걸 다 따야 했다는 게?

translation.en: So how are you bonding with the family?
translation.ko: 이 가족하고는 유대감 잘 쌓고 있어요?

translation.en: Now there's a word I wouldn't use to define your family.
translation.ko: 그 가족에 그런 게 있나 싶은데요

translation.en: [sighs] I wish my Grammy could see me now.
She would have loved Christmas in a palace. Hmm.
translation.ko: 성에서 맞는 크리스마스를 무척 좋아하셨을 거야

translation.en: You were so hot in that Santa suit.
Mm. How could I live without you?
You don't have to. I almost did.
You spent so long in the shower, I thought a prune was gonna walk out.
translation.ko: 하도 샤워실에 오래 있어서 건자두가 나오는 줄 알았거든

translation.en: Who nicked all the hot water?
Ah! Look who's here. The Ghost of Christmases Past.
John. Didn't know you were joining us for lunch today.
translation.ko: 존, 같이 점심 먹는 줄 몰랐네

translation.en: Oh yes. I'm here every Christmas.
Yes, yes. Like a bad penny, I always turn up, you know?
translation.ko: 그래, 달갑지 않은 손님이어도 이런 날엔 꼭 와

translation.en: Not really your thing, though, is it?
Okay. You wanted to meet my family. You've met them. They are a nightmare.
translation.ko: 봐, 우리 가족 만나고 싶대서 이렇게 만났고 다 끔찍해

translation.en: Please can we go back to London before I literally lose my mind?
translation.ko: 나 진짜 미쳐버리기 전에 런던으로 돌아가면 안 될까?

translation.en: So, I… I've made you something.
It's, um, it's vegan and gluten-free with a little touch of caffeine.
translation.ko: 카페인을 소량 첨가한 비건에 글루틴프리 식단이에요

translation.en: And there's always oats down at the stables.
I want you to know I had to have a shower with cold water.
Our shower was like a steam room. I was in there for an hour.
translation.ko: 전 한증탕인 줄 알았잖아요 샤워실에 1시간 있었어요

translation.en: Perhaps it's time to have a little conversation
translation.ko: 온수는 모두 공평하게 써야 한다는 걸

translation.en: about being fair with the hot water.
These old houses are a little bit temperamental.
Don't get me started on the electrics.
At least you got your clothes back.
Please, could everybody just get along
and put their squabbles behind them for 48 hours?
-Uh, where are the children? -Oh, they've already eaten, Mummy.
translation.ko: - 애들은 안 오니? - 미리 먹였어요, 엄마

translation.en: I thought it'd be nice to spend some adult time together.
translation.ko: 어른들끼리 식사하는 게 좋을 거 같아서요

translation.en: I'd like to say that I… I realize it's been many years.
Here's to understatement. Shall we eat?
For heaven's sake, man. Be quiet.
Oh! Left your sense of humor in the colonies, did we?
translation.ko: 이런, 유머 감각은 식민지에 두고 왔냐?

translation.en: You know what? I'll push this so far down your throat, you'll need a colonoscopy to remove it!
translation.ko: 대장 내시경으로 빼내야 할 정도로 이 주먹을 처박아 줄 줄 알아

translation.en: Me and Yankee Doodle Dandy here. Pistols at dawn.
translation.ko: 나와 저 미국인 다 된 놈의 새벽 일대일 결투

translation.en: No, let's do it the American way. Step outside. Now!
translation.ko: 아니, 미국식으로 하자고 당장 밖으로 나와

translation.en: Are they really having a fight?
-[Joanna] Come on, Uncle John! -[Vicky] My money's on Dad.
translation.ko: - 힘내세요, 존 삼촌! - 난 아빠한테 건다

translation.en: -[Jackie] Come on! -[Vicky] Come on! Get in there!
What is it with you Americans? Why… why don't you play to ordinary rules?
translation.ko: 미국인들은 대체 왜 이래? 왜 당최 일반 규칙을 안 따라?

translation.en: -[Vicky] Go on, Dad! Kick him! -[Felix] Oh my God.
-Do it! Do it! Do it! -Come on!
-Go on, do it. You can totally get him. -Come on!
Elizabeth, good God! Put some clothes on.
You're dead to the whole family.
Now you can finish your speech.
Oh my God. Is this happening?
You make me wanna live forever.
So, as long as I do, I'd like you beside me.
translation.ko: 그러니 내가 살아있는 한 당신 곁에 있고 싶어

translation.en: I wanna marry you, and I hope you wanna marry me too.
translation.ko: 당신과 결혼하고 싶어 당신도 내 마음과 같다면

translation.en: I do! I do! I do!
This must be hard for them.
I had a plan in mind
of how this was gonna go.
You've been in America all this time. You haven't even thought about us.
translation.ko: 그동안 미국에 계시면서 우리 생각은 하지도 않았잖아요

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to the post office about the decades
of missing birthday cards and Christmas presents.
translation.ko: 배달 안 된 생일 카드나 크리스마스 선물이 있는지

translation.en: We both agreed it was best to do it this way.
translation.ko: 말 안 하는 게 좋겠다고 서로 합의했다

translation.en: I was in no state to be a father back then.
translation.ko: 그땐 아비 노릇을 할 처지가 아니었어

translation.en: You don't know anything about us.
Your mother kept me in the loop.
I've been incredibly proud of you all.
I was in an incredible amount of pain.
translation.ko: 난 말할 수 없는 고통에 빠져있었다

translation.en: I was dangerously close to inflicting…
Leaving was the right thing to do, at least at the time.
translation.ko: 적어도 그땐 떠나는 게 옳은 일이었다

translation.en: anything to be a part of this family now.
translation.ko: 가족과 함께하기 위해 뭐든 할 거야

translation.en: Do you want to come with us?
I didn't realize Caroline was your sister.
translation.ko: 캐럴라인이 언니일 거라곤 생각도 못 했어

translation.en: Well, yeah. You guys are very different.
True. Send us some more beer.
Here's your order, guys. Six pints and six packets of crisps.
translation.ko: 주문 나왔습니다 맥주 여섯, 감자칩 여섯요

translation.en: Not quite the gourmet feast my beautiful wife prepared,
translation.ko: 제 아름다운 아내가 준비한 진수성찬은 아니지만

translation.en: Hey, James. Jackie would have a heart attack right now.
translation.ko: 제임스, 재키가 이걸 알면 심장발작 일으키겠어요

translation.en: Do not begrudge me a good old-fashioned bag of crisps.
Um, I need to tell you all something.
You're a lesbian. You tell us every Christmas.
Yeah, she tells us every year that she's gay,
and she never provides any evidence.
I don't like men. I just like sleeping with them.
translation.ko: 나도 남자 안 좋아해 같이 자는 것만 좋지

translation.en: Steady on. What's the use in me?
Good Lord, it really is Christmas.
-And like Santa, he only comes once-- -No, don't!
translation.ko: - 산타처럼 1년에 한 번만… - 야, 말하지 마

translation.en: Darling, would you like a whiskey chaser?
Whiskey chasers for all my girls.
Me and you would go shopping every year for Mum
translation.ko: 아빠랑 둘이 매년 엄마 선물 사러 쇼핑 가서

translation.en: and see the Christmas lights on Oxford Street,
And you were the best dad ever.
You just wanted to stay with me while the others went shopping.
translation.ko: 다른 애들은 쇼핑하고 넌 나랑 있고 싶어 했어

translation.en: It was the best time of my life.
I looked for you that Christmas morning, and I looked every Christmas since.
translation.ko: 그 크리스마스 날 아침과 그 후 매년 크리스마스에 아빠를 찾아다녔어요

translation.en: Oh, that is awful. Holy crap.
♪ Bring me some good news Good news… ♪
Thank you very much. Okay, settle down! Settle down!
Ladies and gentlemen, I do not know if you are aware,
we have a very, very special surprise for you tonight.
If you didn't know, the Christmas sisters are here tonight!
Come on up! Come on up to the stage.
and tonight we have a very, very, very special guest.
translation.ko: 오늘 저희에게도 매우 특별한 손님이 있답니다

translation.en: The man, the myth, the legend, our father, James Christmas!
translation.ko: 신화이자 전설적인 존재이신 우리 아빠, 제임스 크리스마스!

translation.en: -What do you wanna sing? -Come on, Daddy.
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ Glad tidings we bring ♪ ♪ To you and your kin ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We all want some figgy pudding ♪
♪ We all want some figgy pudding ♪
♪ We all want some figgy pudding ♪
♪ Glad tidings we bring ♪ ♪ To you and your kin ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ Glad tidings we bring ♪ ♪ To you and your kin ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
She's blown the bloody house up.
You go get some sleep, Peter, all right? I'll… I'll have a fiddle with this.
translation.ko: 자넨 가서 자, 피터 내가 손을 좀 보지

translation.en: -Oh, that's very kind of you, John. -That's all right.
You know about these things, so I think I might just turn in.
translation.ko: 이런 데 훤하시니 전 그만 들어가 볼게요

translation.en: Daddy, if we have no lights, how will Father Christmas find us?
translation.ko: 아빠, 불을 하나도 못 켜면 산타 할아버지가 우릴 어떻게 찾아와요?

translation.en: Well, it's modern times, Henry. Father Christmas navigates by radar now.
translation.ko: 지금은 현대 사회야, 헨리 산타 할아버지도 요즘은 레이더로 비행하셔

translation.en: Well, you don't know, but actually,
uh, last Christmas, um, Rudolph got actually given
a pair of super-duper, top-of-the-range night-vision goggles for this very reason.
translation.ko: 기능 만빵 최신형 야시경이야 바로 이런 때를 위한 거지

translation.en: -That's good. [laughs] -It is good. It is good.
Right, you two. I love you. Go to sleep, okay?
translation.ko: 그래, 아빠가 사랑한다 그만 자렴, 알았지?

translation.en: Yes, well, it'll be okay outside, I think.
-I can't believe how drunk your wife got. -Yes.
She's, uh, passed out upstairs, I believe.
But I'm sure she'll be back to her ebullient self in the morning.
translation.ko: 아침이 되면 언제 그랬냐는 듯 열성이 흘러넘치겠죠

translation.en: Here we are. And then, can you manage one more?
translation.ko: 여기, 그리고 하나 더 들 수 있나?

translation.en: Ooh! That's a big one. There we are.
What is that, actually? Uh, heavy is what it is. Heavy.
translation.ko: - 여기 뭐가 든 거야? - 뭐가 됐든 무거운 거요

translation.en: -You are so bossy. -You've not seen anything yet.
translation.ko: - 명령질 장난 아니야 - 이건 빙산의 일각이지

translation.en: Foxes won't get in there. No problem.
translation.ko: 여우는 거기 못 들어가, 걱정 마

translation.en: Is there anything we can help with?
John is sparking up the mother ship as we speak,
so hopefully, by the morning, we'll have some light.
She's passed out, so she's fine.
I'm not gonna be able to sleep.
[knocking on door] What are you doing? -[Felix] I'm a little busy, darling. -[sighs]
translation.ko: - 대체 뭐 해? - 나 좀 바빠, 자기

translation.en: Will there ever be electricity again?
I have quite enough electricity, thank you.
translation.ko: 내 안에는 전기가 충만해 당신 덕분에

translation.en: Between the two of us, we could power up the Pennines.
translation.ko: 우리 둘 사이의 전기라면 페나인 산맥에도 불이 켜질걸

translation.en: You really are a most remarkable woman.
translation.ko: 당신은 정말 세상 최고로 놀라운 여자야

translation.en: Oh, get on with your work.
I think I need some inspiration.
John's gonna work on it all night, so
eventually we should have some electricity.
No, no, no. No! No! No! No, darling!
I can't believe I blew up Christmas.
You think Santa would mind if I open one of my presents early?
translation.ko: 내가 선물을 미리 열어보면 산타가 화내실까?

translation.en: I don't think he would mind at all.
Well, we must go to the Plough more often.
Maybe no whiskey chasers next time.
I need to check on the kids.
"Tomorrow and tomorrow and tomorrow creeps in this petty pace."
translation.ko: '내일, 그리고 내일, 또 내일 이렇듯 서서히 다가온다'

translation.en: Seventeen years, 364 days, and my marriage is over.
You two were like young lovers last night.
translation.ko: 간밤에 두 사람은 젊은 연인 같았잖아요

translation.en: To have a baby, my friend, one needs to have sex.
translation.ko: 애를 가지려면 말이죠 일단 섹스를 해야 하거든요

translation.en: Unless, of course, she is the Virgin Mary, which she is not.
translation.ko: 동정 마리아라면 모를까 아내는 그것도 아니라고요

translation.en: I haven't been allowed in her room for 18 months.
Then it must be the quickest pregnancy in the history of procreation,
translation.ko: 그렇다면 그건 번식 역사상 최단 시간 임신이겠죠

translation.en: unless, of course, I am now a mosquito.
Yes, and they mate for life.
-I thought that was seahorses. -[screams] Who cares?
translation.ko: - 그건 해마인 줄 알았는데 - 뭔 상관!

translation.en: My wife is having an affair.
Why not? It's a family tradition!
As far away from here as possible!
Is he still upset about the electricity?
Sometimes this house is just too big.
It's because Father Christmas couldn't see the house.
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지가 우리 집을 못 보셨던 거예요

translation.en: No, it's because your father mixed up the presents.
translation.ko: 아니, 아빠가 선물 꾸러미를 헷갈렸던 거야

translation.en: Got him. I've got him again. Another one. Another one.
This is the best Christmas ever.
Well, he should be. He can't do anything right.
translation.ko: 당연히 그래야죠 제대로 하는 게 없으니

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Is this a sausage club where you all stick up for each other?
He left. He said he wanted to get as far away from here as possible.
translation.ko: 떠났어, 여기서 최대한 멀리 가고 싶다고 했다

translation.en: [scoffs] Because he mixed up the presents?
I don't know. He was very distracted. He didn't make a lot of sense.
translation.ko: 모르겠다 뭔가에 무척 흥분해서 말이 앞뒤가 안 맞았어

translation.en: He wouldn't just leave for no reason. He's not you.
translation.ko: 이유 없이 떠날 사람 아니에요 아빠가 아니라고요

translation.en: Leaving you was the most difficult thing I did in my life.
translation.ko: 널 떠난 게 내 인생에서 가장 힘든 일이었어

translation.en: I should have fought harder for you.
I'm going to get ready and find my husband.
translation.ko: 전 이만 준비하고 남편 찾으러 가야겠어요

translation.en: Yeah, so much for great British wood.
Hey, I love your work, by the way.
It would make a very good book.
I mean, I can feel the passion, your love for those mop-top boys.
translation.ko: 그 바가지 머리 밴드를 향한 열정과 사랑이 느껴져요

translation.en: They're the only boys I've ever really liked.
Look, I was thinking, could I take it to my people?
But I… I thought you were a stockbroker.
No, that was Hamish. No, I'm into publishing.
I work with cars, books, magazines.
We also have a great music department in Los Angeles.
Well, somebody left a positive pregnancy test in my bathroom,
translation.ko: 누가 임신으로 나온 테스트기를 내 화장실에 버렸는데

translation.en: and Peter saw it, and now he's gone.
No, no. Why did Peter leave you?
[sobbing] Because he thinks I'm having an affair.
Then why does he think you have a fancy man?
translation.ko: 근데 왜 딴 남자가 있다고 오해를 해?

translation.en: I need to know whose this is. Somebody's pregnant.
I've done ten tests in ten days, and…
No, it's not wonderful. I'm gonna have a bloody baby.
translation.ko: 하나도 잘 안 됐어 내가 망할 애를 낳는다니까

translation.en: But because of you, my husband's left me because he thinks I'm an adulterer.
translation.ko: 근데 너 때문에 내 남편이 내가 바람난 줄 알고 떠났어

translation.en: for the men in this family to walk out on Christmas Day.
translation.ko: 이 집 남자가 크리스마스 날에 떠나는 게

translation.en: Mummy, how can you defend him after what he did to you?
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠가 어떻게 했는데 편을 드세요?

translation.en: After what I did to him.
Elizabeth. Now is not the time.
I can't live with this secret anymore.
translation.ko: 더는 이 비밀을 안고 살 수가 없어

translation.en: Your father left because I had an affair.
translation.ko: 내가 바람을 피워서 네 아빠가 떠난 거야

translation.en: [sobbing] I always knew I was different.
We had you when we were still in our teens.
What on earth is going on?
Has Greek drama come to Dunnock Manor? What?
[Henry] Is Daddy back from his walk?
If we're going to do this nativity play, we need to go now.
translation.ko: 성탄극 하러 갈 거면 지금 출발해야 해요

translation.en: Right, and I can't be late.
Don't worry, sweetheart. You won't be late. I'll find your Dad.
translation.ko: 걱정 마라, 안 늦을 거야 아빠 찾아오마

translation.en: John, I need your help. Come on.
Well, what a lovely reunion, eh?
Right now, you're gonna help save a marriage for once.
translation.ko: 지금은 형도 부부 하나 건지는 데 일조해

translation.en: sorry you behaved much better than I did.
This could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
Thank you. Ah, thank you all.
This year, as always, the children are well-prepared,
with the help of their wonderful teacher, Mrs. Stressel…
who will also accompany them on the piano.
It was in a bleak midwinter
when Mary and Joseph made their way to Bethlehem.
How much longer, Joseph? I'm so tired.
translation.ko: 얼마나 더 가야 해, 요셉? 나 너무 힘들어

translation.en: Get in this. We'll be there in no time.
Have you booked a room in Bethlehem?
It's okay. I sent them a text.
You know, my wife, your daughter, is having an affair,
translation.ko: 제 아내, 장인어른 딸이 바람을 피우고

translation.en: and she's having a baby with someone else.
No, she's not. It's Joanna's baby.
-Oh, Caroline must be furious with me. -She is.
The face of a man who wishes he'd handled things a little differently.
translation.ko: 이렇게 박차고 나온 걸 후회하는 남자의 표정

translation.en: You know, I was so wrapped up trying to build a practice
that I actually neglected my wife and my girls.
And my big brother, John, was there to fill in for me.
So that Christmas morning, I ran.
translation.ko: 그래서 그 크리스마스 날 아침에 도망쳤어

translation.en: Until Vicky came to visit me in Miami…
completely unaware that she's the reason I left.
translation.ko: 그 애 때문에 내가 떠난 걸 전혀 모르는 거야

translation.en: And I decided it was finally time
to put an end to all this nonsense.
I love Vicky as my own daughter.
But she is John and Elizabeth's child.
Any fool could see how much in love they were.
translation.ko: 그 둘이 진심으로 사랑하는 게 보였어

translation.en: Just as any fool could see how much in love you and Caroline are.
translation.ko: 마찬가지로 자네와 캐럴라인도 진심으로 사랑하는 게 보여

translation.en: I've got some grandchildren to see in their Christmas pageant.
translation.ko: 내 손주들 성탄극 보러 가야 해

translation.en: Think you'd wanna be there too.
♪ The stars in the bright sky ♪
I'm so sorry. I love you, you silly thing.
translation.ko: 나도 정말 미안해 사랑해, 이 바보야

translation.en: Your dad came to get me.
Why does Wise Man Number Three have his guinea pig with him?
Oh, he thinks I'm gonna chop its head off.
You're gonna be an incredible mother.
I have missed you, big brother.
Now, I really hope we all enjoy our delicious Christmas meal.
translation.ko: 모두 맛있는 크리스마스 만찬을 즐기시길 바랍니다

translation.en: But before we do, I think it is important
translation.ko: 그런데 그 전에 해야 할 게 있습니다

translation.en: that we say a big thank you to the Christmas family
translation.ko: 크리스마스 가족에게 감사의 박수를 보내주셨으면 해요

translation.en: who have stepped in very kindly to serve food for you today.
translation.ko: 고맙게도 오늘 여러분께 음식을 배식해 드린다고 합니다

translation.en: You must have sprouts at Christmas.
What kind of music do you like?
It's… Did you not? There we are.
Jambo, could we live in England?
Can we get a modern castle? Like, maybe five years old?
translation.ko: 현대식 성에서 살면 어때? 5년 정도 된 걸로?
- 요크셔 푸딩 드려요? - 칠면조랑은 안 먹어
- 요크셔 푸딩 드려요? - 칠면조랑은 안 먹어 - 너무 기름지죠? - 옆으로 늘어나잖아

translation.en: It'll make me grow, won't it?
Uncle John, it's gonna be very weird for me to call you Dad.
translation.ko: 삼촌, 아빠란 말은 입에서 안 떨어질 거 같아요

translation.en: Would 30 years of pocket money help?
Oh, my darling. I love you so much.
-Darling, I am so sorry about the meal. -Oh, don't worry about it.
translation.ko: - 음식 못 먹게 된 거 미안해 - 괜찮아

translation.en: I really need to, uh, fix that fence.
Honestly, this has been the best Christmas ever.
translation.ko: 정말 괜찮아 역대 크리스마스 중 최고야

translation.en: This is gonna be the finest turkey you've ever eaten in your life.
Dude, you're giving her so much turkey.
Oh my God, I forgot Ben.
I left him back at the house tied up on the bed.
Oh, don't worry about it. He'll get used to it.
Do you really want to marry me?
Of course I do. I love you.
We spend next Christmas with my family.
Of course. Where do they live?
Is it okay if I bring my family?
I just wish it would have snowed.
Leave it with me. The name's not Christmas for nothing.
translation.ko: 나만 믿어, 내 성이 괜히 크리스마스겠어?
